summary: The diff does not add the required generated PNG sticker assets or any frontend/public assets. Instead, it modifies backend canister code and project metadata, and updates a frontend file summary documentâ€”changes that are unrelated to the requested sticker PNG generation and static asset hosting.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generate 3 separate vintage-style price tag sticker images as transparent-background PNGs (512x512) with subtle paper texture and a small peeled corner; text must be exactly MINT (green), NEAR MINT (blue), PLAYED (orange).
missing_requirements.reason: No PNG assets are added in the diff (Added files: none), and there is no evidence of image generation output files or any changes under frontend/public/assets/generated.
evidence: File diff summary: Added files: none

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the generated sticker PNGs under frontend/public/assets/generated and ensure they are loadable via /assets/generated/<filename>.
missing_requirements.reason: No files are added under frontend/public/assets/generated (or anywhere in frontend/public). The diff provides no evidence that the three required PNGs exist or that they can be served from /assets/generated/ paths.
evidence: File diff summary: Added files: none
frontend-file-summaries.txt (modified) does not evidence new static assets being added

hallucinated_features.description: Backend canister changes introducing subscription status types/storage and admin-only update/query functions with access control checks.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is focused on generating and adding static PNG assets and explicitly lists a non-goal: do not change backend canister logic. These backend subscription/access-control changes are not requested.
evidence: backend/main.mo (modified): adds SubscriptionStatus type, subscriptionStatus map, updateSubscriptionStatus(), getSubscriptionStatus(), and admin/user permission checks

hallucinated_features.description: Project metadata update marking the requested items as pending feature requests (AR-1/AR-2) in project_state.json.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest asks to actually generate and add PNG assets; updating project tracking metadata is not requested as part of implementing the requirements.
evidence: project_state.json (modified): new_feature_requests includes AR-1 and AR-2 with status "pending"

hallucinated_features.description: Frontend documentation/summary updates describing numerous UI/editor/theme features (e.g., sticker tray, sprite sheet, binder theme, icons) without evidence of requested sticker PNG assets being added.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only requests adding three specific PNG files to static assets; broad frontend feature descriptions are unrequested and do not satisfy REQ-2.
